text: Kathaṃ bhāvitā ca bhikkhave ānāpānassati kathaṃ bahulīkatā cattāro satipaṭṭhāne paripūreti
edit: Kathaṃ bhāvitā ca bhikkhave ānāpānassati kathaṃ bahulīkatā cattāro satipaṭṭhāne paripūreti?

translations.transtext: 149. Monks, how was mindfulness of breathing cultivated? How does [it], [when] having been practiced frequently, fulfill the four foundations of mindfulness?
